myth.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an idea or story that many people believe, but which is not true
myth.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: It was important to dispel the myth that AIDS was a gay disease.
myth.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events
myth.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: the giants of myth and fairytale
